(Original) Many nice stuff here, Rio Frio Cave, Rio on Pools, Caracol, Big Rock falls, 1000ft falls and many more. Driving is recommend only with a SUV, Caracol only with an additional guide, better would be a guided tour if you are not familiar with the area. Very limited mobile phone reception, downloading Google maps for navigation is advisable. Also in the area are done luxurious resorts but better check them out for yourself.

topComments.author: Kristen Seese
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Bela. Fomos √†s 3 paragens principais. Caverna Rio Frio, Rio On Pools e Big Rock Falls. A caverna era muito divertida de explorar um pouco e era muito maior do que eu esperava. O Rio on Pools era o nosso favorito. Muitas piscinas naturais para nadar, mas as pedras s√£o realmente escorregadias! Recomendaria andar descal√ßo neste. Big Rock Falls era uma bela cachoeira com alguns pontos divertidos para pular de penhasco nas piscinas. Voc√™ pode nadar at√© as quedas! Todos os 3 lugares s√£o perfeitos para fam√≠lias. Recomendaria fazer um passeio para esta viagem. As estradas s√£o dif√≠ceis, mas os locais administram-nas, por isso acho que pode ser feito por conta pr√≥pria.  (Original) Beautiful. We went to the 3 main stops. Rio Frio Cave, Rio On Pools, and Big Rock Falls. The cave was so much fun to explore for a bit and was a lot bigger than I was expecting. Rio on Pools was our favorite spot. Many natural pools to swim in but the rocks are really slippery! Would recommend going barefoot on this one. Big Rock Falls was a beautiful waterfall with some fun spots to cliff jump from into the pools. You can swim right up to the falls! All 3 places are perfect for families. Would recommend taking a tour for this trip. Roads are rough but locals manage it so I guess it‚Äôs doable on your own.
